officialTitle: Randomized, Clinical Trial to Compare the Serological Response Rates of Serofast Early Syphilis Cases Retreated With Three Doses Benzathine Penicillin and Absence of Any Retreatment
inclusionCriteria:
* Early Syphilis Cases Determined to Be Serofast at 6 Months after Initial Treatment
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 60 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Human immunodeficiency virus (HIV)-infected
* Baseline serology showed a nonreactive RPR test
* follow-up is inadequate
* Allergic to penicillin
* Pregnant woman
